hitupa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha , hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mahathmiya da mema guna samaru uthsawaya amathimata niyamithayi.mema awasathawata parlimenthu mathi amathiwarun , palath sabha manthriwarun athulu wishesha aaradhithayin rasakage sahabhagithwayen pawathwe. 1926 di shri lankika deshapalana kshetha්rayata eksath jathika paksha apekshayaku lesa kolambaa nagara sabhawata tharanga wadimin athulath wu ethuma 1951 di eksath jathika pakshaye samajikathwayen iwathwa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pihituwa gaththeya.
